name: Hector Araujo
description: Electrical Engineer with knowledge in FrontEnd(Angular, Javascript, TypeScript) y BackEnd (MySQL, JAVA, Spring Boot)

experience.descripcion: Operate medium and high voltage equipments. Supervise electrical teams. Desing engineering details for synchronism projects. Provide customer support.

Planning preventive and corrective maintenance using SAP-PM. Develop maintenance indicators that allow evaluating trends and behavior of the equipment. Provide technical support to production. Report status of equipments to the plant manager.
Planning preventive and corrective maintenance for generator. Programming electrical modules for generator set. Desing engineering details for synchronism projects. Provide customer support.

proyectos.descripcion: Design a web portfolio with a descentralized arquitecture. Desing the FrontEnd using HTML, CSS, Boostrap, Angular and TypeScript. Design a Database usin MySQL. Create and desing the APIs needed (BackEnd) to conect with the FrontEnd.

proyectos.nombre: Design a portal view of a webpage
proyectos.descripcion: Desing the view of a webpage using HTML,CSS, JS y Bootstrap
